data.name: Quest for Quality Conference
data.description: Quest for Quality is a 2-day forward thinking annual software QA and testing conference, discussing the latest trends and topics of the quality assurance, bringing together international thought leaders addressing latest challenges of new technologies.

data.name: General
data.description: Conferences covering a wide range of web development and software engineering topics.

relatedRecords.name: UXDX
relatedRecords.description: UXDX brings together UX, Design, Dev and Product to learn how to shift from delivering projects to working as cross-functional teams that build products customers actually want. Come and join us on 8 - 9 October, 2020 in Dublin to learn more.

relatedRecords.name: THAT Conference
relatedRecords.description: THAT Conference is the Summer Camp for Geeks that combines technology, networking, social events and exposure in an inspirational, family friendly environment at the The Kalahari Resort in Wisconsin Dells.
